name: Untitled Sword Game (Auartic)
description:
Keyboard:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Attack: F
  • Block/Parry: Q
  • Reset scene: R

Controller (Xbox layout):

  • Movement: Left stick or D-pad
  • Jump: A
  • Attack: X
  • Block/Parry: Y
  • Reset scene: Start

Try blocking just before an attack hits to parry and hit the bot for extra posture damage!  Also, kindly don't walk too far in either direction or else the world will stop existing.
